comment.author: 45586426@N06
comment._content: Vought F-8B Crusader with first four of six digit serial number on base of tail. 1454??. Squadron number 27 on fuselage and repeated above rudder. (The serial is from a known batch of F8U-1E later F-8B) Tail code 7W of NAS Willow Grove Pennsylvania Words ‘NAVY’ over ‘MARINES’ on rear fuselage. Full serial number is displayed forward and below horizontal tailplane but cannot be read as resolution of image is insufficient. Possibly belonging to a shared Naval Air Reserve unit and Marine Air Reserve Training Detachment (MARTD) at NAS Willow Grove Either from VF-931/VF932/VF-33W2/VF-34W1/VF34W2 up to 1968-1969 gator.crouze.com/chapter6page.html (information taken from this internet webpage) Insignia on upper tail is that taken from the insignia for NAS Willow Grove: bluejacket.com/usn/insignia/av/oth/nas_willowgrove_insig.jpg
